org.archive.io.warc

Class TestWARCRecordInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.archive.io.warc.WARCRecordInfo
      • org.archive.io.warc.TestWARCRecordInfo
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.archive.format.ArchiveFileConstants, org.archive.format.warc.WARCConstants

    public class TestWARCRecordInfo
extends org.archive.io.warc.WARCRecordInfo
implements org.archive.format.warc.WARCConstants, org.archive.format.ArchiveFileConstants
    WARCRecordInfo with default values and convenience factory methods. TODO: use existing well-tested HTTP library for generating HTTP content-block.
    See Also:
    TestWARCReader

    • Method Detail

      • dt14ToISOZ

        public static String dt14ToISOZ(String dt14)
                         throws IOException
        translates DT14 (YYYYmmddHHMMSS) to ISOZ format used in WARC-Date header.
        Parameters:
        dt14 -
        Returns:
        ISOZ (YYYY-mm-ddTHH:MM:SSZ)
        Throws:
        IOException - dt14 is in bad format (wrapping ParseException to simply error handling)

      • setCreate14DigitDateFromDT14

        public void setCreate14DigitDateFromDT14(String dt14)
                                  throws IOException
        utility method for updating create14DigitDate from DT14.
        Parameters:
        dt14 - DT14 (YYYYmmddHHMMSS)
        Throws:
        IOException - dt14 is in bad format.

        public static TestWARCRecordInfo createHttpResponse(String payload)
                                             throws IOException
        return TestWARCRecordInfo for HTTP Response with entity payload. Content-Type is text/plain, and payload is encoded in UTF-8.
        Parameters:
        payload -
        Returns:
        Throws:

        public static TestWARCRecordInfo createHttpResponse(String ctype,

                                             throws IOException
        return TestWARCRecordInfo for HTTP Response with entity payload.
        Parameters:

        payloadBytes - payload bytes

      • buildHttpResponseBlock

        public static byte[] buildHttpResponseBlock(String ctype,
                            byte[] payloadBytes)
                                     throws IOException
        short cut for generating "200 OK" HTTP response content-block.
        Parameters:
        ctype - HTTP Content-Type, such as "text/plain", "image/gif"
        payloadBytes - payload bytes
        Returns:
        content-block bytes with HTTP status line, HTTP headers and payload.
        Throws:
        IOException

      • buildHttpResponseBlock

        public static byte[] buildHttpResponseBlock(String status,
                            String ctype,
                            byte[] payloadBytes,
                            boolean chunked)
                                     throws IOException
        return content-block bytes for HTTP response.
        Parameters:
        status - HTTP status code and status text separated by a space. ex. "200 OK".
        ctype - HTTP Content-Type
        payloadBytes - payload bytes
        chunked - if true, use chunked transfer-encoding
        Returns:
        content-block bytes with HTTP status line, HTTP headers and payload.
        Throws:
        IOException

                                     throws IOException

      • buildRevisitHttpResponseBlock

        public static byte[] buildRevisitHttpResponseBlock(String ctype,
                                   int len,
                                   boolean withHeader)
                                            throws IOException
        generates WARC content for new revisit record.
        Parameters:
        ctype - value for Content-Type
        len - value for Content-Length
        withHeader - include HTTP status line and headers. passing false generates old-style revisit content block.
        Returns:
        record content as byte array
        Throws:
        IOException
